description: A second year middle school student, Soako is the heroine of the special episodes of Hatsukoi Limited. The first introduction of Soako is when she is late for school. Unfortunately for Soako, in her lateness, she has forgotten to put on underwear. The story follows her throughout the day, and all the problems that she has. She was, however, helped by http://anidb.net/ch6561 [Mamoru], which made her fall for him (to http://anidb.net/ch6556 [Ayumi]`s dismay).
name: Andou Soako
